articles.content:

articles.author: Adam Booker
articles.title: The Five Words Stefan Savic Said to Jack Grealish at Manchester City Revealed in Major Warning Prior to Atletico Madrid Second-Leg - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: A new report has revealed the five words that were sent as a warning from Atletico Madrid defender Stefan Savic towards Manchester City's Jack Grealish, during the tail-end of the Champions League quarter-final first-leg at the Etihad Stadium last week.
articles.content: Manchester City booked their spot in the UEFA Champions League semi-finals on Wednesday night thanks via a 0-0 draw in a fiery quarter-final second-leg clash with Atlético Madrid, seeing Pep Guardiol… [+1997 chars]
